summary:
I have successfully completed the `seo-contracts-base` task. Here's a summary of what was accomplished:

## Summary

I completed the **`seo-contracts-base`** task, creating a base SEO-optimized contracts listing component.

### Files Created:

1. **`laravel/app/Livewire/SeoContractsList.php`** - New Livewire component that extends `ContractsList`:
   - Accepts filter parameters via mount (housingType, energySource, city)
   - Housing type to consumption mapping (omakotitalo: 18000, kerrostalo: 5000, rivitalo: 10000)
   - Energy source filtering (tuulisahko, aurinkosahko, vihrea-sahko)
   - SEO data generation (title, description, canonical URL, JSON-LD)
   - Finnish localization with proper locative forms for 20 major cities

2. **`laravel/resources/views/livewire/seo-contracts-list.blade.php`** - View with:
   - JSON-LD structured data (Schema.org ItemList)
   - SEO-optimized hero section with custom H1 and intro text
   - Breadcrumb navigation
   - Internal links section for related
